body.p: is a flexible, intuitive collaboration platform designed to adapt to virtually any type of workflow that a collaborative team may use for their documentation life cycle. It allows a Content Author to upload documents that need to be reviewed by subject matter experts or other team members. The Reviewers simply follow a link and login to where they can access the uploaded documents to review, add comments, or contribute changes. They can share the files with other Reviewers and all of them can communicate with each other and the Content Author directly from the interface. Ultimately, the Content Author has access to a Merge tool that allows them to automatically merge all of the changes back into Oxygen XML Editor or Oxygen XML Author.
